`jenis_rka`,`td`.`jumlah2` AS `jumlah2`,`td`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`td`.`jumlah1` AS `jumlah1`,`td`.`volume_rek` AS `volume_rek`,`td`.`jumlah_harga` AS `jumlah_harga`,`td`.`satuan1` AS `nm_barang`,`ref_rekening`.`nm_rekening` AS `nm_rekening` from (((`tabel_dpa` `td` left join `ref_program` `rp` on(((`rp`.`bk` = `td`.`bk`) and (`rp`.`ck` = `td`.`ck`) and (`rp`.`dk` = `td`.`dk`) and (`td`.`m` = `ref_rekening`.`m`) and (`td`.`n` = `ref_rekening`.`n`) and (`td`.`o` = `ref_rekening`.`o`))))
